name: Hello Kitty Picnic with Sanrio Friends
synopsis: Help Hello Kitty and Sanrio friends prepare for their picnic in the park in this fun collection of 10 mini-games! Collect all your picnic goodies and decorate five scenes including Hello Kitty’s bedroom, kitchen, and more. Earn apple rewards to unlock new supercute outfits for Hello Kitty and special items you can use to decorate scene backgrounds. Includes all your favorite Hello Kitty characters: Hello Kitty®, My Melody®, Keroppi®, Chococat®, Badtz-Maru®, Little Twin Stars®, and many more! Follow voice narration and use the Touch Screen for all activities!
